item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:45:43 UTC – Details)


Loomla: Provide your pets with a high-quality daily life.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9 inches; 1.98 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VC1402
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Shenzhen Jiangrui Investment Development
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NKF9PLS

High Capacity – Staying hydrated can be a challenge for pets, especially during the summer months. The Loomla stainless steel cat water fountain is your answer to a long-lasting water supply for small pets in your home. The dog and cat water fountain holds 85 ounces, it’s enough water for a small animal for almost a week! The water level window shows you how much is left in the cat and dog water bowl dispenser, so your pet can stay hydrated and not get thirsty.
Whisper-quiet – This water fountain for cats inside has a water pump that is so quiet, you’d never know it’s there! The low noise water dispenser for cats and dogs is a great way to help your pets stay calm and hydrated at night. Many animals are frightened by loud noises, so the quiet design of this dog and cat fountain water bowl makes it more enticing for animal owners who want their pets healthy and content.
Entertainment For Your Pet – Our cat and dog water fountain was designed with your pets in mind and provides an easy way for them to quench their thirst while having fun at the same time! A pet water fountain can be just the cool thing you need in order to keep your little buddy hydrated and entertained. Pet supplies water fountains are an amusing way of making water enjoyable for animals.
Always Clean & Fresh Water – Don’t let your pets go thirsty! Our pet fountain is a great way to keep your furry friends hydrated. The dog and cat water dispenser ensures that no matter how busy you might be, they’ll always have clean and fresh water to drink. The cat and dog water dispenser filter uses multiple purification systems, it purifies the water using carbon non-woven fabric and ion exchange resin. 2 exchange filters are included with the dog and cat supplies water fountain.

Why should you choose the Loomla Water Fountains?

  • Fun for your pet – For your pets drinking from a drinking fountain is way more interesting and fun than just drinking out of their bowl.
  • Stylish Design – The pet drinking fountain has lovely and stylish bellflower design and comes in a variety of colors that make it an attractive home decor item.
  • 3 Water Flow Settings – Adjusting the automatic water dispenser settings to match your pet’s size and tastes is easy. Just choose one of our automatic drink dispenser modes: Flower waterfall / Waterfall and fountain / Fountain
  • Healthy choice – Clean water is one of the most important aspects of your pet’s health. Pet water fountain filter has an upgraded sophisticated filtration system that filters water better than ever before.
  • Easy Installation – Our automatic dog water dispenser is easy to set up, just affix the pump, install led next to the water level window, add filter and drinking dish on top, and you are good to go! We also provide a manual with our water fountain for dogs inside.

Read more

Structure of Loomla Fountain

Take Good Care of Your Pet

What should you pay attention to?

  1. The fountain’s LED lights have two modes that can be controlled on and off.
  2. The pump has two locating holes to assist installation.
  3. Please use it indoors on a flat surface.
  4. For your pet’s health and safety, clean the water pump at least once every two weeks.
  5. To provide clean enough water continuously, please replace the filter and the sponge every two or three weeks, and rinse the filter with water before use.
  6. Please be careful to prevent pets from chewing the wires and swallowing the parts.

What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9in）

1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）

1 x DC Pump (with a 70.9in cord）

2 x Filters

1 x Pre-filter Sponge

1 x Instruction Manual








Replacement Filters&Sponge
Replacement Pump
Pet Fountain Stainless Steel
Pet Fountain Blue
4L Pet Fountain Grey
Dog Nail Grinder

item.content:encoded:
Price: $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:28:34 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Two pack you will get: 1* cat feeder, 1* cat water dispenser. Food Grade Material: Our pet feeder made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The automatic cat feeders refills with water and food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.1 gallon Large capacity: You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party after choose our automatic cat feeders.Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base of the dog feeder and features a wide mouth for convenient hand-washing.

With automatic gravity flow technology, the automatic pet feeder no electricity required at all, can be used both indoor and outdoor.The Structure of our automatic dog feeder is stable, will not tip over.

High Quality Materials

The automatic pet feeder is made from high-quality plastic material, BPA – free, safe, healthy and environmental protection, perfect care of your love pet.

Easy to Add Food

Uncover the cap on the top of the dog food bowls, you can add dry pet food easily. After the lid is closed, the grain can be kept away from damp and moldy with a good sealing.

Large Groove

With 15 degree carefully slope and a large groove of the pet feeder, Food comes out smoothly and no food stuck, friendly for pets to eat and drink.

Non-slip Rubber Feet

Non-slip rubber feet under the base of dog feeder and dog water dispenser for secure safe placement. The automatic dog feeder can be used both indoor or outdoor with no electric needed.

Siphon Design

The screw cover the bottle of the dog water bowl dispenser is made of siphon design. When the water in the dog water bowl reaches a certain height, the spring device which on the cat water dispenser will close and the water stops flowing automatically.

3.8L Big capacity

The cat water bowl can hold about 3.8 L water, can satisfy your small medium or big pets at the same time, about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets.

Questions and Answers：

Q: Will my dog eat much more than he need as this is automatic?A: Usually, the first day when he use the automatic dog feeder, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.Q: Will the water overflow?A: When the water in the water tank reaches a certain height, the spring device in the middle of the barrel mouth will automatically close, and the water will stop flowing; when the water is below a certain height, the spring device will automatically open and continue to flow out.Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?Our dog water bowl dispenser and dog food bowls set is made from food grade plastic material, it is safe and tasteless.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 27 x 17.5 x 35.5 inches; 3.95 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 22, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Hipidog
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08X4J54R1

[High Quality Food Grade Materials]: The automatic water dispenser for dogs is made from high-quality plastic material, BPA – free, safe, healthy and environmental protection, perfect care of your love pet. The cat bowls for food and water is 100% new material, anti-fall durable.
[Automatic Refills Food and Water with Gravity]: Automatic cat feeders system with self-gravity feeding design for this automatic pet feeder, to dispense dry food as pets empty the bowl, prolonging time between refills. The water bowls for large dogs adopt siphon device design, can perfect prevention of water leakage, control the speed of drinking water supply to prevent overflow.
[Big Capacity for Small Medium Large Pets]: Both cat food dispenser and cat water dispenser with large capacity 3.8L. Can last about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets. You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party, do not have to worry about pets will be hungry.
[Humanization Design Convenient to Use]: With 15 degree carefully slope design, The dog food bowls will not stuck food. The upgraded base is thicker and heavier, would not tip over when pets eating. And non-skid rubber feet under the dog feeder and dog water bottle dispenser for secure placement. Moreover, barrel and chassis of the automatic dog feeder can be split, you can rinse it directly with water. It is recommended to wash once a week.

  • Two pack you will get: 1* cat feeder, 1* cat water dispenser.
  • Food Grade Material: Our pet feeder made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.
  • Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The automatic cat feeders refills with water and food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.
  • 1 gallon Large capacity: You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party after choose our automatic cat feeders.
  • Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base of the dog feeder and features a wide mouth for convenient hand-washing.

Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

【2022 70W Thermostatically Controlled Birdbath Water Heated】AC 120V 70W the outdoor bird bath de-icer thermostatically controlled to operate when necessarily, will automatically turn off at 118 °F and restart work at 68 °F. Heated bird bath prevents water from freezing due to 0-degree F or colder weather. Attract more birds to your yard in winter！
【Heavy Duty Material & Automatic Start-stop Design】Bird bath heater aluminum base surface and full coverage aluminum liners, with highly heat conductive and durable for maximum usage to prevent rust. Built-in an additional thermostat sensor which working continuously in the circuit. When the heating base temperature exceeds 118°F (48°C) will Automatic Disconnect and the temperature drops to 68°F (20°C), the heating will automatically start to ensure safety. Provide better care for your birds.
【Waterproof Design & Safe for Bird】Built-in full-coverage partition layer and high-density aluminum shell double protection can better protect the heating wire, heavy-duty Pond De-icer can waterproof and rust to ensure the safety of birds. Built-in heating cord allows birds and squirrels won’t get hurt if they peck at the electric cord keeps curious birds safe. Allows birds to play in warm water in winter.
【Plug and Play】The birdbath heater has no spare parts to replace, simply plug into a power source and your birds or farm animals will enjoy the gentle warmth water within minutes; In order to prolong the service life of the product, please make sure the heated chicken water Deicer is full cover by water.
【Widely Application】This bird bath heaters can provide fresh flowing warm water for birds and small animals outdoors in winter. Attract more birds to your yard to drink and bathe, It will make you happy to look out during a beautiful snow storm and see a bird getting a drink or a moment of rest from the weather.

item.dc:creator: admin

Wind-and water-resistant, this ultra-light style pulls over your head with a half ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $31.50
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:47:26 UTC – Details)


Here’s a gotta-have pullover jacket that has endless uses in your weekend wardrobe. This lightweight, effortless windbreaker from Champion is perfect to toss in your weekend tote, to keep in your golf bag, or with your workout gear. Wind-and water-resistant, this ultra-light style pulls over your head with a half zipper and features a handy scuba-style neckline and hood with bungee cord closure. Better yet, it folds right up into its own front zip pocket, creating a neat little pouch that fits anywhere, even a briefcase. This packable jacket can be easily layered over a sweatshirt or sweater. And it’s detailed with elasticized cuffs to keep out wind and rain, plus a bungee-cord hem to adjust as you choose. And maybe the best thing about it is that it’s made of 100% recycled polyester so you can feel good about wearing it. When you wear this packable windbreaker jacket, you’ll proudly display the Champion logo on the chest and the iconic “C” logo appliquéd at the left cuff.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 22 x 18 x 1 inches; 8.68 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ V1012
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 15, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Champion
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B078GPYT9H

Imported
Polyester lining
Zipper closure
Machine Wash

LIGHT AND PACKABLE – Folds into its own zip pocket to form a neat pouch you can tuck away anywhere.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:27:35 UTC – Details)


The PetSafe healthy pet water and food station is the ﬁrst gravity food system with a removable-stainless steel bowl that is easy to clean and is dishwasher safe. Simply sanitize the stainless steel bowl at high temperatures in your dishwasher to eliminate potential bacteria that can cause your pet harmful infections from micro-organisms, allergic reactions or skin and nose irritations. The coordinating PetSafe healthy pet food station and healthy pet water station are designed to complement most home decor. Space-saving footprints and modern style are ideal for kitchens, laundry rooms, garages and other indoor areas. Sold separately is the healthy pet water filter to remove chlorine, sediments and odor from your pet’s drinking water. Water A: small- .5 gallon. The activated carbon filter removes bad tastes and odors from the water and catches large particles and debris from re-circulating back into the water. The filters do not purify the water. Change them every 2-4 weeks, depending on how many pets use the fountain, to keep the fountain water fresh and clean.

How did we get our start?

Multiple Filtration：WOPET W300 pet water fountain has a triple filtration system. The sponge captures bulky contaminants like pet fur and debris. The ion exchange resin layer softens tap water, and the activated carbon removes nasty flavors and scents.Change the filter every 1 week will be more healthier!
BPA FREE & High-End Materials: Our W300 cat water fountain is BPA free, durable, and it’s easy to operate and clean,Make your pet fall in love with drinking water, no need to worry their health problem any longer.
Ultra-Quiet Pump: The pump is whisper-quiet and stays below 35 decibels. Low-voltage pump is reliable and usually lasts 2 years. The pump is detachable and replaceable.
Easy to Set Up and Clean: WOPET W300 cat drinking fountain is easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning and replacement. Note：the pet fountain Doesn’t come with a wall plug. It is recommended to use a 5V, 1A adapter or power bank to operate it.

WOPET Pet Water Fountain is made of high quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, durable, safe and easy to assemble and clean.

2 Flow Designs could attract pets to drink more water.

Visible Water Level could check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

Emergency Water Storage

Read more



Cleaning the pump is essential to extend water fountain life and keep the water fresh. Please clean the pump at least every two weeks.

The steps of cleaning the pump

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the Pump Connector Rubber

Step 3. Remove the pump cover

Step 4. Remove the impeller

Step 5. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more


Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week. Especially the small grooves on the fountain can be cleaned every day. Small grooves are designed to filter impurities, allowing pets to drink healthier water.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl. The lowest water level is more than the water outlet of the pump.

4. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, Change the filter every 1 week will be healthier!

5. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

6. WOPET Never Authorized any sellers to sell official genuine filters. For your pet’s health and safety, please search “B0B5Q4N6Q2” to purchase the real WOPET W300 Filters,DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.

7.Make sure the filter is SOAKED, The water needs to flow through it and it will just spill over if the filter isn’t soaked thoroughly.

From the brand

At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs.

CW002 Pet Water Fountain

CW003 Pet Water Fountain

CW004 Pet Water Fountain

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.67 x 8.58 x 5.59 inches; 2.71 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Submarine
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ H&H
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09ZPBW85D
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Switzerland

【Wide Drinking Area】The drinking dispenser with the 300ml extra-large water dish is ideal for families with multiple pets. Even in the event of a sudden power outage, there is enough water to last a day.
【Noise-Free】The pet water fountain is equipped with unique water way design which reduces the sound of the water flow to less than 36 decibels, and enjoys a quiet moment with your cute pet.
【Premium Materials】The dispenser is made from high quality ABS material which is BPA free, for a more durable experience.
【Powerful Filtration】The 3-stage filtration system of the water fountain effectively removes sediment, dust, hair, odor, chlorine, heavy metals for a clean drinking experience.
【3 Flow Modes】The fountain has 3 modes namely spring, flower bubble and flower waterfall, which can be switched as per the pet’s needs, which will help keep your pet interested to help them drink more water.
【After Sales】With our reliable quality control, customer service and technical support, we provide you with a 6 month return policy. If you have any confusion regard to the product, please feel free to contact us.
Note: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

PUPIHOM CW003 Pet Water Fountain

* 7*24 circulating filtration, so that every drop of water can be fully purified, drinking clean, soft water for a long time is beneficial to the health of the pet’s urinary system.

* The pet water feeder solves your trouble of frequently feeding pets. The 3.4L effective capacity can supply a small and medium pet for a week, which is suitable for families who often take short trips.

* Design Patent: The water flowing from the drinking tray can wash away the hair and debris on the surface, keeping the water clean at all times.

* The appearance of this automatic water dispenser is designed by an Italian designer, which conforms to modern aesthetics, making it not only a pet water dispenser, but also matches the design of your home.

  • Model: CW003
  • Capacity: 3.4L/115oz
  • Filters: 3 Pack
  • Filter Model: PAWF001
  • ! For indoor use only!
  • ! The filter should be changed every 2 to 3 Weeks
  • ! The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks

Read more

Anti-dry-burning pump, you don’t have to worry about burning out the pump even if there is water shortage. The pump has a life span of 2.5 to 4 years.

The three-speed adjustable water pump can be used with different water outlet modes. It is recommended to use the lowest gear with the spring mode, and the mid-range and high-end gears with the faucet mode.

Removable water pump, easy to clean, proper cleaning and maintenance of the pump will help prolong the service life of the pump, it is recommended to clean it once a month.

Read more

Safety Protection: 1.2m woven power cord, which is sturdy and tight, and not easy to be bitten or chewed by pets, don’t worry about pet safety.

Minimalist structure, easy to install and clean, it is recommended to clean the pet drinking fountain once a month.

Contains 3 replacement filters. The triple filtration system with water softening function ensures safer, cleaner, and fresher drinking water, making your pet healthier.

Read more

Pet Water Fountain

Q: Where can I get replacement filters?

A: Please search for B0B2JYRZCD for the replacement filters.

Q: The pet water fountain does not run with water, what should I do?

A: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

Q: Can l use this drinking fountain outside?

A: No. This fountain is designed for indoor use only.

Q: How frequently do l need to replace the filter?

A: According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, please replace the filter every 2 to 3 weeks.

Q: How often should l clean the fountain?

A: The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks. Please clean it once a week if you re living in an area with hard water.

Q: Does it have to be plugged in all the time or can it run on batteries?

A: This pet fountain has no batteries, so it needs to be always plugged in.
